articles.title: About My Work
articles.description: These are some projects I've been working on at Bren
articles.contents:
Master’s Group Project
Evaluating the Climate Mitigation Potential of Natural and Working Lands in Santa Barbara County
A team of 5 students working for the County of Santa Barbara to incorporate a natural and working lands (NWL) component into the Climate Action Plan update. Includes a carbon stock and emissions inventory, a projection to 2030, stakeholder engagement about carbon-smart management practices, and recommendations of how the County can promote future carbon sequestration through NWL management.
Check out our project website here
Carbon Accounting Project
Bren Hall Climate Risk Assessment
A team of five students working on studying the climate-related risks to Bren Hall and the Bren community, with recommendations on how to mitigate potential damages.


Corporate Sustainability Plan
5 Year Sustainability Roadmap for Dole Foods, Inc.
A team of four students working on a sustainability plan, focused on food, people, and the environment, for Dole Foods.

articles.title: Minnie Ringland
articles.contents:
Minnie Ringland
          
          
          Home
          Portfolio
          Resume
          Data Analysis
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Minnie Ringland
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            Hi! Thanks so much for visiting my page.
            I’m currently pursuing a master’s degree from the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management at UCSB, with a focus on Economics and Politics of the Environment, as well as Energy and Climate. I have a background in biology, experience in industrial environmental compliance, and am now focused on finding ways to promote a low-carbon future through policy and corporate standards.
            I am a transplant from Buffalo, NY and am now flourishing in sunny Santa Barbara, CA. When I’m not in classes or meetings, I like to go for walks on the beach, tend to our backyard compost, and dream of places to go once we can travel again.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Minnie Ringland

I have a background in biology, experience in industrial environmental compliance, and am now focused on finding ways to promote a low-carbon future through policy and corporate standards.
              I am a transplant from Buffalo, NY and am now flourishing in sunny Santa Barbara, CA. When I’m not in classes or meetings, I like to go for walks on the beach, tend to our backyard compost, and dream of places to go once we can travel again.
